summary: The class orchestrates a latent diffusion workflow that converts a textual description into an image. It tokenizes and encodes the prompt with a BERT model, conditions a UNet denoiser with this encoding, iteratively refines latent image representations using a scheduler, and finally decodes the latents back to pixel space with a vector‑quantized VAE.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end AI generation of images from text for creative content, marketing, product visualization, and rapid prototyping.
